tasks: Review Copilot Instructions - Check Recent Changes

tasks.label: Review Copilot Instructions - Check Recent Changes
args: echo '=== Recent Directory Changes (last 7 days) ===' && find ${workspaceFolder} -maxdepth 2 -type d -mtime -7 -not -path '*/\.*' 2>/dev/null | sort && echo '' && echo '=== Recent Files Added/Modified (last 7 days) ===' && find ${workspaceFolder} -maxdepth 3 -type f \( -name '*.py' -o -name '*.js' -o -name '*.java' -o -name '*.dart' -o -name 'package.json' -o -name 'requirements.txt' \) -mtime -7 2>/dev/null | sort && echo '' && echo '=== ACTION REQUIRED ===' && echo 'Review the above changes and update:' && echo '  .github/copilot-instructions.md' && echo '' && echo 'Consider documenting:' && echo '  - New directories or project areas' && echo '  - New dependencies or tools' && echo '  - Changed conventions or patterns' && echo '  - Important architectural decisions' && echo '' && (open -t ../../.github/copilot-instructions.md 2>/dev/null || code ../../.github/copilot-instructions.md)
